about_the_game:
In the hour of gloom and monsters, when the world has already plunged into chaos, you can go on a fun and fun adventure that will blow up your imagination and you will certainly get a lot of fun. If you dare to plunge into this world of blackness and madness, then in addition to pleasure, you can also get endless adrenaline that will boil in your blood.

You can do absolutely anything:
- Go to the surface for new supplies – donuts are already waiting for you!
- Go for equipment - the tire iron is your life!
- To complete the task – yes, like two wolves to cut down!
- Modify your weapons and equipment-absolutely no problem!

Visit all points of known and unknown metro stations, take tasks, collect any tin that catches your eye. Do not forget about the food that will go to you for a single dinner, because you will have no time to eat in this world.
Invite your friends and acquaintances – it will be a great journey into the world of continuous destruction, from which your jaw will simply drop! Build a base together, conquer all the subways in the end!
detailed_description:
In the hour of gloom and monsters, when the world has already plunged into chaos, you can go on a fun and fun adventure that will blow up your imagination and you will certainly get a lot of fun. If you dare to plunge into this world of blackness and madness, then in addition to pleasure, you can also get endless adrenaline that will boil in your blood.

You can do absolutely anything:
- Go to the surface for new supplies – donuts are already waiting for you!
- Go for equipment - the tire iron is your life!
- To complete the task – yes, like two wolves to cut down!
- Modify your weapons and equipment-absolutely no problem!

Visit all points of known and unknown metro stations, take tasks, collect any tin that catches your eye. Do not forget about the food that will go to you for a single dinner, because you will have no time to eat in this world.
Invite your friends and acquaintances – it will be a great journey into the world of continuous destruction, from which your jaw will simply drop! Build a base together, conquer all the subways in the end!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires friends to play!
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires friends to play!

name: Onetics - New Evolution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires friends to play!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires friends to play!
